about_the_game:
※ This is a demo version.

※ Save data will not carry over to the full version.

Revive the restaurant passed down from your grandmother and aim for a three-star rating!

Enter a fairy tale world where you’ll battle enemies and gather ingredients in action-packed,

while also hiring and training staff to manage your restaurant.

This game offers a blend of restaurant management and fairy tale action!

　　　　Fairy Tale Action　　　　

Gather Ingredients

Step into a fairy tale world and collect all kinds of ingredients!

Defeat creatures, and you might just find rare, high-quality ingredients.

The more you gather, the more delicious dishes you can serve at your restaurant!

Fairy Tale Skills

Unleash powerful abilities inspired by fairy tale characters in battle!

Use them strategically to turn the tide of the fight in your favor!

Cooking

Use the ingredients you’ve gathered to prepare delicious dishes!

Meals can restore your HP, inflict status effects on enemies, and more.

Will you stockpile ingredients or cook up powerful meals to take down tough foes? The choice is yours!

　　　　Restaurant Management　　　　

Staff

Hire staff to work at your restaurant!

Assign them to roles that match their strengths to keep your business running efficiently.

During Business Hours

Various events occur while your restaurant is open!

  • Attracting customers

  • Cleaning the restaurant

  • Serving dishes

  • Dealing with troublesome guests

Handle these tasks efficiently to keep your customers happy!

 　　　　Other Features　　　　 

  • Permanently boost your stats by eating special dishes during action sequences.

  • Unlock new stages and recipes through exciting challenges!

 　　　Streaming Guidelines　　　 

You are free to upload and stream videos without prior permission, whether you are an individual or a company.

There are no restrictions on monetization or gameplay coverage.
